Package CRUD

Class AppointmentCRUD

  • java.lang.Object
    • CRUD.AppointmentCRUD
  • public class AppointmentCRUD
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles all database connections involving the appointment and appointment report classes

                                         java.lang.String lastUpdatedBy,
                                         int customerId,
                                         int userId,
                                         int contactId)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        /** This method adds a new appointment to the Database
        Parameters:
        appointmentId - new appointment's ID
        title - new appointment's title
        description - new appointment's description
        location - new appointment's location
        type - new appointment's type
        start - new appointment's start
        end - new appointment's end
        createDate - new appointment's creation date
        createdBy - name of user who created appointment
        lastUpdate - new appointment's last update date
        lastUpdatedBy - user who updated new appointment last
        customerId - new appointment's customer ID
        userId - new appointment's user ID
        contactId - new appointment's contact ID
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • checkOverlapUpdate

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> checkOverlapUpdate​(java.sql.Timestamp start,
                                                                                java.sql.Timestamp end,
                                                                                int custID,
                                                                                int apptID)
                                                                         throws java.lang.Exception
        This method checks the database for overlapping appointments when updating.
        Parameters:
        start - the customer input start time to check
        end - the customer input end time to check
        custID - the customer id that needs to be checked for overlapping appointments
        apptID - this variable makes sure that the appointment we are trying to update isn't included in checking for overlaps
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
